flawed_nl_solution:
Denise is 25 - 2 = <<25-2=19>>19 years old now.
So, Diane is 19 - 4 = <<19-4=15>>15 years old now.
Diane will be 25 years old in 25 - 15 = <<25-15=10>>10 years.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 23, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
